name: Hasi-Geco
body:
### Simulating Hard Spheres in Geometric Confinement

hasi-geco provides a configuration space for [mocasinns](https://github.com/bkrueger/mocasinns). It helps you to simulate Hard Sphere liquids or serves as a good starting point for developing your own Hard Sphere simulations with [mocasinns](https://github.com/bkrueger/mocasinns).

### What works?
* 3D Hard Spheres in Confinement
* Available Confinements: spheres, cylinders, plates, nodal approximations of periodic p, d, g and iwp-surfaces - all from inside and outside

### What's to come?
* Rejection free simulation methods
* Alternative step proposal schemes

### See also
* [mocatie](http://speckfleck.github.io/mocatie)

### Authors and Contributors
* Johannes F. Knauf (@SpeckFleck)
